Relaxing Monday with my baby.... ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ @marcanthony #love A post shared by Raffaella Modugno (@raffaellamodugno) on Aug 28, 2017 at 10:46am PDT

Making memories. Happy Memorial Day weekend. Wishing you the best 😘 ❤ @raffaellamodugno #forzanapoli A post shared by Marc Anthony (@marcanthony) on May 27, 2017 at 3:31pm PDT

Que es esto tan bello ??? 😍🤤 A post shared by Saul Alvarez (@canelo) on Jun 23, 2017 at 11:25pm PDT

(Excerpt) Read more at: E! Online

Wake Up To Breaking News! SUBMIT

Anthony's love life was a giant mystery to us back in May, like seriously—a lot was going on.That month, we learned that the singer was no longer with 21-year-old model Mariana Downing and was now finding love with Modugno. But then photos surfaced of the "Felices Los 4" singer and his ex-wife Shannon de Lima out on a yacht, and that sent people into a tizzy. Telemundo reported that...
title: Marc Anthony Gets Playful With Girlfriend Raffaella Modugno
